The Carlton on Madison is centrally located near the 28th St. 4,5,6 subway stop, and within walking distance of the Empire State Building, Flatiron district, and Madison Square Park. Central Park is about a 30-minute walk away, and it's easy to get around the city via subway to visit other attractions.
The Carlyle is located near the Met and Whitney museums, with many high-end boutiques within walking distance. Some rooms offer views of Central Park.

The Franklin Hotel is located on the upper east side and is within walking distance of the Guggenheim and Metropolitan Museum of Art, with the subway being around the corner. Some reviewers mentioned that it's a good location for visiting the Met Museum, Neue Galerie, and the Guggenheim Museum.
The French Quarters Guest Apartments are within walking distance of the Museum of Modern Art (MoMA). The hotel is also conveniently located near subway lines for easy access to downtown.
The Gem Hotel Chelsea is located in Chelsea, within walking distance of art galleries. The hotel is also close to public transportation for access to other areas of Manhattan.
This hotel is located within walking distance of Times Square. Some reviewers mention walking to various locations in Manhattan, from Central Park to the Brooklyn Bridge.
The Gem Hotel is located on the edge of the Lower East Side, within walking distance of the New Museum. It is also close to subway lines for access to other parts of the city.
The Grant Hotel is located on the Upper West Side, 1.5-2 blocks from the subway, and 3-4 blocks from Central Park. It is 10 minutes by cab or 15 minutes by subway to Times Square.

The Hampton Inn Times Square North is within walking distance to MOMA and other museums and is close to several subway lines. The hotel is located near 5th avenue, the theater district, Times Square, and Central Park.
The Carlton House is located on the upper east side of Manhattan, one block from Central Park and a short cab ride to Museum Mile. Some rooms have kitchenettes and sitting areas.
The Helmsley Park Lane is within walking distance of the Frik Museum and Museum of Modern Art (MOMA). Its location on Central Park South is ideal for walking to major sites in Manhattan.

The Herald Square Hotel is centrally located in Midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of the Empire State Building, Penn Station, Times Square, and a few subway stops for easy access to museums. The hotel offers basic, clean rooms at an affordable price, with amenities like free Wi-Fi, in-room safes, and complimentary coffee in the lobby.

Hotel 91 is located in Manhattan's Chinatown, close to the Lower East Side and within walking distance of SoHo and Little Italy. The F subway line is a 5-10 minute walk and can transport guests to various locations, including the Lower East Side.

The Hotel at Times Square is within walking distance of the Museum of Modern Art (MoMA), and a short bus ride away from museums on Central Park South, such as the Metropolitan Museum of Art and the Natural History Museum. The Frick and Whitney Museums are also nearby.
The Inn at Irving Place is located in the Gramercy area of NYC. It is furnished with antiques and is designed to feel like a 19th-century mansion.
The Iroquois is located in midtown Manhattan within walking distance of many attractions. A long walk or bus ride will get you to Central Park, where some of the best art museums can be found.

The Jane is in the West Village, near the Meatpacking District and Greenwich Village. It's about 10 minutes walking distance to the 8 Ave and 14th St subway station, and the subway is about 4 blocks away.

The Kimberly Hotel is located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Rockefeller Center, 5th Avenue, museums, and Central Park. Subway lines are nearby for easy access to other parts of Manhattan.
The Lombardy is located on 56th St between Park and Lex, within walking distance of museums, shopping, and Central Park. The subway is two blocks away at 54th and Lex.
The London NYC is within walking distance of MOMA and near other museums and attractions. The hotel is located in midtown, close to Central Park, shopping on 5th Avenue, and Times Square.
The Lucerne is located on the upper west side of New York, a pleasant walk through Central Park to the 'museum mile'. It is also near the Museum of Natural History.
The Manhattan Club is within walking distance of MOMA, Lincoln Center, and the Metropolitan Museum. Subway access is easy from this location, and buses run crosstown on 57th.

The Mansfield Hotel is located in midtown Manhattan, near 5th Avenue and within walking distance of Times Square and Grand Central Station. Some reviewers describe it as a boutique hotel with small but clean and stylish rooms, while others mention noise issues and cramped spaces.
The Marcel is within walking distance of Chelsea and the East Village and has subway access to other areas. The hotel has modern decor, and some rooms have views of the Empire State Building.

The Maritime Hotel is located in Chelsea, within walking distance of Greenwich Village and close to subway stations for access to other parts of the city. The Rubin Tibetan Museum and ABC carpet & Home are within walking distance.
The Mark is located on the Upper East Side, close to museums, art galleries, and Central Park. It is also a five-minute walk from the Metropolitan Art Museum.

The Marmara Manhattan is located on the Upper East Side, a few blocks east of Central Park and close to the Guggenheim, Whitney, and Met museums. The hotel is accessible by subway, with the stop on 96th street.

The Mave is in the midtown area of Manhattan and within walking distance of Madison Square Park and Union Square; it is also equidistant from uptown and downtown. The hotel is conveniently located near subway lines for easy access to other attractions.
The Mercer is located in SoHo, within walking distance of Greenwich Village, NoLita, and NoHo, and close to subway connections. It has a library in the lobby and is near many boutique-style shops.

The Michelangelo Hotel is centrally located near MOMA, Rockefeller Center, and within walking distance of Times Square and Broadway. The hotel has large, clean rooms, and is known for its helpful concierge service.
The Milburn Hotel is located on the Upper West Side, a few blocks from Central Park, and a 15-minute walk to the Metropolitan Museum of Art. Museum Mile is also accessible via crosstown bus.

The Muse Hotel is centrally located a short walk from Times Square, and convenient to Rockefeller Center, Central Park and 5th Ave. The hotel features trendy, recently renovated rooms, comfortable beds, and a wine hour.
The New York Helmsley is located in midtown Manhattan, close to Grand Central Station, Times Square, and the Chrysler Building. Some reviews mention a view of the Empire State Building.
The New Yorker Hotel is centrally located near Penn Station and Madison Square Garden. Some rooms have views of the Empire State Building or the Hudson River.
The Pierre is located on Fifth Avenue, across from Central Park, and within walking distance of Museum Mile. A cheap cab ride from the hotel can take you to just about anywhere in the city.

The Plaza Hotel is located at the south end of Central Park on 5th Ave, equidistant between the Guggenheim, the Metropolitan Museum, MoMA, and Broadway theaters. It is also a stone's throw from the high-end 5th Avenue stores.
The Pod Hotel is located in Midtown East and is within walking distance of MOMA. It is a few blocks from the E and 6 subway lines, allowing easy access to any part of Manhattan.

The Premier is located half a block from Times Square on 44th street, within walking distance of The Empire State Building, Central Park, and Grand Central Station. The hotel is connected to the Millenium Broadway.
The Ritz-Carlton Central Park is located within walking distance of MOMA. Guests can walk to the shopping area near 5th avenue.
The Roosevelt Hotel is located in midtown Manhattan near Grand Central Station, Times Square, and 5th Avenue. Some reviewers mention walking to many attractions and cultural venues from the hotel.
The Sherry-Netherland is located across from Central Park and close to MOMA. It is within walking distance of museums, Broadway theaters, and Rockefeller Center.

The Shoreham Hotel is centrally located in midtown, near MOMA and within walking distance of other museums, as well as Central Park and 5th Avenue. Some reviewers mention the hotel's modern, stylish decor, while others note that rooms can be small.
The St. Regis is located on 5th Avenue and 55th Street, within walking distance of art galleries and museums like MoMA. The hotel sometimes offers packages that include breakfast.
The Standard Hotel is in the Meatpacking District, near Chelsea art galleries. The High Line Park is nearby and gives a great chance to explore the area.
The Surrey is located on the Upper East Side, a few blocks from the Metropolitan Museum, and within walking distance of the Met and Whitney. It is also a block away from Central Park.
Sylvan Guest House is located in Harlem, close to the Jumel Mansion, the oldest house in Manhattan. It is accessible to downtown Manhattan via the 163rd street Metro and express train.
The Time Hotel is located near Times Square and within walking distance of Rockefeller Center. Some reviewers mention that it is a short subway ride to the Museum Mile.

The Waldorf Astoria is located within walking distance of MOMA and is near a subway station for easy access to other parts of the city. It is a historical landmark hotel with some mentions of "old world glamour" and specific praise for its lobby.
The Westin New York at Times Square is within walking distance to museums such as the Metropolitan and Hayden. It is also near the subway for easy access to other locations.
Hotel Thirty Thirty is located near the museum district via the subway and within walking distance to many attractions. The hotel is described as a good base for sightseeing.
The Thompson LES is located within walking distance of the East Village and Soho. It is near a subway stop, which can take you to various parts of the city.

The Travel Inn is located within walking distance of Times Square, and subway stations facilitate access to uptown areas, where some art museums can be found. One reviewer mentioned easy access to the Met Museum of Art, and another mentioned walking to some museums.

The hotel is in a convenient location in walking distance to Soho, Chinatown, and Little Italy, and close to all the cool neighborhoods. It is located near subway lines and is within walking distance of Greenwich Village.

The hotel is located near Central Park, Lincoln Center, and Columbus Circle, providing access to cultural attractions and is within walking distance of Times Square and Fifth Avenue. Some suites feature views of Central Park, and the hotel offers a car service for transportation.

The Tudor Hotel is located on the east side of midtown Manhattan, near Grand Central Station and a few blocks from the subway; some reviewers mention walking to museums. This location is described as central but quiet, with easy access to transportation and walkable access to Midtown sites.

The Vincci Avalon is centrally located in Manhattan, close to the Empire State Building and a short walk from the NY Library; Some reviewers mention the hotel's proximity to museums in general, while others mention The Native American Museum. The location is convenient to subway lines for accessing Central Park and other parts of Manhattan.

W New York - The Court is located in midtown Manhattan, close to Grand Central Station and within walking distance of Park Avenue. It is also near the Chrysler Building and a few blocks from the subway.

The W Tuscany is located near Grand Central Station, putting it within walking distance or a short subway ride to many places in Manhattan. The hotel is close to Midtown, and some reviewers found it walkable to museums.

The W Times Square is centrally located and within walking distance to a variety of museums. Some reviewers recommend it for business and solo travelers due to its chic, trendy atmosphere, upstairs lobby bar, and modern amenities.

The W Union Square is near a subway, allowing easy access to downtown or uptown, and is within walking distance of the Village, Soho, East Village, Tribeca, and the Meat Packing district. It is not especially close to museums, but convenient subway access makes them relatively accessible.

The Waldorf Towers is centrally located in Midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of many city highlights. It is also in easy reach of the Broadway Theatres, Empire State Building, Times Square, and Central Park.

The Wall Street Inn is located in downtown Manhattan, near the Wall Street subway station, which provides access to the subway system for reaching destinations such as the Metropolitan Museum of Art on 72nd street. It is about 15 minutes by train to Times Square.

The Warwick Hotel is located across the street from the Museum of Modern Art (MOMA) and near the American Folk Art Museum, and offers easy access to museums along 5th Avenue. The hotel has a history related to the arts, including murals in the restaurant.

The Washington Jefferson Hotel is within walking distance of MOMA and close to the subway for access to other museums. Some reviewers mentioned art vendors in the Greenwich/Soho/West Village area accessible from the hotel.

Washington Square Hotel is located in Greenwich Village, near NYU and a subway station, with easy access to downtown Manhattan. Reviews mention that MOMA is a taxi ride away and the hotel displays art deco touches with black and white photos of movie stars.

The Wellington Hotel is near MoMA, and a couple of blocks from the Broadway Theater area. Some reviewers mention seeing the hotel's sign on the cover of Buenavista Social Club's CD "BSC at Carnegie Hall".

The hotel is centrally located in Manhattan, within walking distance of the Museum of Art & Design and the Museum of American Folk Art. It is also a few minutes' walk from Columbus Circle and Lincoln Center.

Woogo Central Park Apartments is located on the Upper West Side, within walking distance of Central Park and a short subway ride to Times Square. It is located near the Dakota building and a few blocks from Lincoln Center.

The Wyndham Garden Hotel - Times Square South is located in Midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Times Square, Penn Station, and the Theater District. It is near subway lines and is convenient to transportation.
